about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hello, I'm Uğur. I've been developing software for over 4 years; sometimes someone who stares at the screen for hours, sometimes someone who saves (or completely breaks) the world with a single line of code.
about.experience: From mobile applications to web interfaces, from backend services written with Node.js to simple but smooth user experiences, my hands have touched code in many areas. I love creating user-centered, simple but functional work. My goal is 'it works and it's beautiful' rather than 'it works but it's not beautiful'.
about.passion: I love exploring new technologies, writing clean code, and saying 'that's it' to myself when I solve a problem.
about.summary: In short: I'm a developer who feels design, loves code, and cares about details.
about.quote: I like my coffee black, my code clean.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Some of the projects I've developed

tabuApp.title: TA BU: Categorized Taboo Game
tabuApp.description: TA BU, which I developed with Flutter, is a mobile game application that enriches the classic Taboo game with different categories. Players can choose any category they want and play in easy or hard mode.
tabuApp.features: Developed with a single codebase for both Android and iOS.|Game flow and state management are provided by BLoC architecture.|Includes various categories such as general knowledge, music, sports, and food.|Game settings like time, round, and pass rights can be customized by the user.|Features a simple and user-friendly interface design.|Published on Play Store and App Store.

googleKeepClone.title: Google Keep Clone
googleKeepClone.description: This project is a one-to-one clone of the Google Keep application, developed with Flutter. The goal is to recreate the functionality and design of a real application from scratch using Flutter. This project was prepared to showcase my skills in modern UI design with Flutter, Firebase integration, and professional app cloning.
googleKeepClone.features: Create, edit, and delete notes.|Color selection and pinning.|List-type notes, search, and sorting.|Responsive and simple user interface developed with Flutter.|Real-time data storage with Firebase Firestore.|User authentication with Firebase Authentication.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: A modern, responsive, and high-performance personal portfolio website. Developed using Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modern web technologies. Features multi-language support, dark/light mode, animations, and SEO optimization.
portfolio.technologies: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
portfolio.features: Multi-language support (Turkish/English).|Dark/Light mode automatic theme switching.|Responsive design perfect appearance on all devices.|Performance optimization fast loading.|Modern UI/UX clean and user-friendly interface.|SEO optimization optimized for search engines.|Modular structure reusable components.
